document_data.mainbody:
Darndreth Goldsword was a nobleman of Cormyr in the late 14 century DR.
He was the youngest Goldsword.
Darndreth Goldsword was a participant in the Rightful Conspiracy, an attempt to murder Alusair Obarskyr and her mother, Filfaeril Obarskyr, in . He was delayed by Noumea Cardellith.
